graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:BusinessPartnerPortalCreatePurchaseInvoiceHeaderInput!)
{
	businessPartnerPortalCreatePurchaseInvoiceHeader (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		businessPartnerId
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	businessPartnerPortalGetPurchaseInvoiceHeaders (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	businessPartnerPortalFindPurchaseInvoiceHeader (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	businessPartnerPortalFindPurchaseInvoiceHeaderById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:BusinessPartnerPortalUpdatePurchaseInvoiceHeaderInput!)
{
	businessPartnerPortalUpdatePurchaseInvoiceHeader (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	businessPartnerPortalDeletePurchaseInvoiceHeaders (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		invoiceNumber
		supplierInvoiceNumber
		externalId
		externalSystemCode
		invoiceDate
		receivedDate
		dueDate
		status
		subtotal
		taxAmount
		discountAmount
		totalAmount
		paidAmount
		currencyCode
		paymentTermDays
		notes
		approvalNotes
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
